interpretation:
The Small Blue Diamond card represents the preciousness of clarity and confidence. This card is a reminder that even the smallest things can hold great value. Just like a diamond, your inner strength and determination should be treasured and celebrated. 

This card may indicate a time of increased clarity in your life. You may find yourself making decisions with more confidence and certainty. Trust in your intuition and know that your inner voice is leading you in the right direction. 

The Small Blue Diamond card may also represent a need for clarity in a situation. You may need to take a step back and reassess your priorities or goals. Trust that with clarity comes the confidence to make the right decisions. 

Overall, the Small Blue Diamond card encourages you to embrace your inner strength and value. Trust in your abilities and know that you are capable of achieving great things.
